title: Note - These spaces shall be exclusive of open spaces to be required at sector-level layouts
clause_text: Note - These spaces shall be exclusive of open spaces to be required at sector-level layouts. Notwithstanding anything contained (2) UDCPR, 10% open space shall be provided in sector level layout. Such open space shall be calculated by considering area of the sector excluding roads in Master Layout Plan and Town Level Amenity spaces excepting Economic Activities.) The requirements prescribed above are by considering School to be run in double shift,

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
